overview: Vlad Dracul III by Mario Salieri is a movie in two parts that tells the true story of Prince of Wallachia, member of the House of Draculesti, also known by his patronymic of Dracula, really existed in the thirteenth century he was known for his cruelty that was an inspiring source for the Irish writer Bram Stoker to create his most famous character, Dracula. The narration in a documentary style is precise to report the facts faithfully and the mysterious circumstances surrounding the life, death and the legend of Vlad Dracul III, obviously focusing on the erotic fantasy aspects made in Salieri style.
title: Vlad Dracul 1
